info.description: The Qordoba API provides secure programmatic access to everything available on our web platform using industry standard JSON for input and output of richly structured data. Organized around REST, our API has predictable, resource-oriented URLs, and uses HTTP response codes to indicate API errors. We use built-in HTTP features, like HTTP authentication and HTTP verbs, which are understood by off-the-shelf HTTP clients.
info.title: QordobaAPI
info.bonus: This is your birthday song! It is not very long!
